description:
It’s the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!  Though our heroes outnumber the bandit king, countless wandering spirits in the underground temple give their strength to Diabound!  If the Pharaoh falls, the supreme evil Zorc will finally rise to destroy the planet!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The End of Bandit King Bakura
